H

handleMessageFromClient(Object, ConnectionToClient) - Method in class emailServer.Server
handles messages from Clients 1st message is always a login request after that, if the message is a string: if command, handle appropriately, otherwise append to textArea if the message is an email, toString() it and append it to the console textArea
handleMessageFromClient(Object, ConnectionToClient) - Method in class server.AbstractServer
Handles a command sent from one client to the server.
handleMessageFromClient(Object, ConnectionToClient) - Method in class server.AdaptableServer
Handles a command sent from the client to the server.
handleMessageFromClient(Object, ConnectionToClient) - Method in class server.ObservableOriginatorServer
This method is used to handle messages coming from the client.
handleMessageFromClient(Object, ConnectionToClient) - Method in class server.ObservableServer
This method is used to handle messages coming from the client.
handleMessageFromServer(Object) - Method in class client.AbstractClient
Handles a message sent from the server to this client.
handleMessageFromServer(Object) - Method in class client.AdaptableClient
Handles a message sent from the server to this client.
handleMessageFromServer(Object) - Method in class client.ObservableClient
This method is used to handle messages from the server.
handleMessageFromServer(Object) - Method in class emailClient.Client
Handle a message from the server 1.
handleMessageFromUI(String) - Method in class emailClient.Client
This method handles all data coming from the UI if message is not empty: if message is a command, call command(String) else send to server
handleMessageFromUI(String) - Method in class emailServer.Server
This method is to handle any command that the user at the server console types.
hasEmails() - Method in class emailCommon.Mailbox
 
help - Variable in class emailCommon.clientGUI
 
HelpFrame - Class in emailCommon
 
HelpFrame(String[], String[]) - Constructor for class emailCommon.HelpFrame
Creates a new JFrame with 3 panels: 1st panel contains information 2nd panel contains a list of command names and descriptions 3rd panel contains general information
host - Variable in class client.AbstractClient
The server's host name.
